blogs.title: My Second Blog
blogs.body: The purpose of lorem ipsum is to create a natural looking block of text (sentence, paragraph, page, etc.) that doesn't distract from the layout. A practice not without controversy, laying out pages with meaningless filler text can be very useful when the focus is meant to be on design, not content.
blogs.author: Lola

blogs.title: Tiger-slayer Wu Song
blogs.body: Wu Song is a legendary figure from fiction the Water Margin. He is famous for slying tiger with barehands, avenging his brother and then finally become an outlaw.
blogs.author: Joyce

blogs.title: Tatoo Monk Lu Zhishen
blogs.body: Lu Zhishen is also a lengendary hero from fiction the Water Margin.
blogs.author: Joyce

blogs.title: the Water Margin Characters
blogs.body: The 108 Stars of Destiny are at the core of the plot of Water Margin. It inclues 36 Heaveenly stars and 72 Earthly Fiends
blogs.author: Lola
